name: Crime victim compensation commission
text:
PART II.  ESTABLISHMENT OF COMMISSION

     There shall be a crime victim compensation commission composed of three members appointed and removable in the manner prescribed by section 26-34.  No officer or employee of the State or any county shall be eligible for appointment to the commission.  The commission is placed within the department of public safety for administrative purposes. [L 1967, c 226, pt of §1; HRS ; am L 1970, c 105, §5; am L 1987, c 338, §10; am L 1989, c 177, §4 and c 211, §8; am L 1992, c 260, §1; am L 1998, c 240, §4]
